xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/243463-Didi, the Treasure Raider 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rIB9ArTIaEgYUF8YUDCAjkoGCPw.jpg Didi works as a butler at Pedro's father's house. While browsing an old photograph album, he and 10-year-old Pedro find an ancient map with the route to a treasure. They decide to search for it. But the treasure carries a curse cast by the three thieves who had stolen it first, during WW2. Didi, the Treasure Raider
